infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture receipts and document debt-related expenses.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses your contacts to help you quickly select people when creating debts.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app can add debt reminders to your calendar to help you stay on top of payment due dates.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app can create reminders for debt payments to help you manage your financial obligations.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app sends notifications to remind you about upcoming debt payments and due dates.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to attach receipts and images to debt records.
